titles.title: To extend the authority of the Thomas Paine National Historical Association to establish a memorial to Thomas Paine in the District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 10/5/1999--Introduced. Extends until December 31, 2003, the authority of the Thomas Paine National Historical Association to establish a memorial to Thomas Paine in the District of Columbia.
